title: "Farewell etaoin shrdlu"
content:
Found this link on Design observer. Not that I can attend, being in London, but I'd imagine that some of you will be interested. Bit late notice, I know.

'Rare screening of "Farewell etaoin shrdlu" a documentary on the last night of hot metal typesetting at the New York Times'

[http://tdc.org/events/2007events/2007tdcsalonschlesinger.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018014736/http:/tdc.org/events/2007events/2007tdcsalonschlesinger.html "http://tdc.org/events/2007events/2007tdcsalonschlesinger.html")
author: G T

comments.content: It's such a great albeit chilling film of changing technologies and their related, yet required, craftsmanship.
